attributes.action: To lower the voting age to 16!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of our petition is to raise awareness of the issue of decreasing the voting age to 16. As a Citizenship prroject, we would like the students of our school to show their interest in lowering the voting age by signing the petition we would like to create.

rejection.details: Due to the high number of petitions recieved, we can not accept petitions similar to existing petitions. A similar peition to yours already exists and can be found on the petitions webpage.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
